Package com.alcineo.softpos.payment.api.interfaces

Interface NFCListener

  • public interface NFCListener
    Provide interface necessary to process a transaction for NFC

    This following linterners is call following the transaction flow

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • activateNFC

        void activateNFC()
        Activate NFC Field.
        Example of Implementation : 
        
     public void activateNFC() {
          NfcAdapter.getDefaultAdapter(activity).enableReaderMode(activity, this::onNfcTagRead, NFC_FLAGS, null);
     }
        with: see NfcAdapter 
             private static final int    NFC_FLAGS =   NfcAdapter.FLAG_READER_NFC_A
                                             | NfcAdapter.FLAG_READER_NFC_B
                                             | NfcAdapter.FLAG_READER_SKIP_NDEF_CHECK
                                             | NfcAdapter.FLAG_READER_NO_PLATFORM_SOUNDS;
     private IsoDep lastTagRead;
     private void onNfcTagRead(Tag tag) {
         lastTagRead = IsoDep.get(tag);

         try {
             lastTagRead.connect();
         } catch (IOException e) {
             Log.e(TAG, "onNfcTagRead: ", e);
         }
         lastTagRead.setTimeout(3000);
     }

      • deactivateNFC

        void deactivateNFC()
        Deactivate NFC Field.
        Example of Implementation : 
        
     public void deactivateNFC() {
         NfcAdapter.getDefaultAdapter(activity).disableReaderMode(activity);
     }

      • getCardStatus

        CardStatus getCardStatus()
        Get status, return if the card is on the field CardStatus.PRESENT_ON_FIELD, CardStatus.ABSENT_OFF_FIELD.
        Example of Implementation: 
        
     public CardStatus getCardStatus() {
         if (lastTagRead != null && lastTagRead.isConnected()) {
             return CardStatus.PRESENT;
         }

         return CardStatus.ABSENT;
     }
        Returns:
        CardStatus

      • transceiveApdu

        byte[] transceiveApdu​(byte[] cApdu)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Transceived APDU to the card.
        Example of Implementation: 
        
     public byte[] transceiveApdu(byte[] bytes) throws Exception {
         return lastTagRead.transceive(bytes);
     }
        Parameters:
        cApdu - must be send to the card
        Returns:
        rapdu, the data return bye the card
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • resetNFCField

        boolean resetNFCField()
        Reset NFC Field.
        Example of Implementation: 
        
     public boolean resetNFCField() {
         return false;
     }
        Returns:
        false

      • setTimeout

        void setTimeout​(int timeoutInMs)
        Initialise the timeout of NFC.
        Example of Implementation: 
        
     public void setTimeout(int timeout) {
         lastTagRead.setTimeout(timeout);
     }
        Parameters:
        timeoutInMs - timeout for NFC configuration

      • onNfcTagDiscovered

        void onNfcTagDiscovered​(android.nfc.Tag tag)
        Listener call when card is detected on NFC field.
        Example of Implementation: 
        
  public void onNfcTagDiscovered(Tag tag) {
      lastTagRead = IsoDep.get(tag);
      try {
          lastTagRead.connect();
      } catch (IOException e) {
          Log.e(TAG, "onNfcTagRead: ", e);
      }
      lastTagRead.setTimeout(3000);
  }
        Parameters:
        tag - nfc tag read
